packages.name: Packages
packages.desc: Bundle or import QuickAdd automations as reusable packages.

announce.name: Announce Updates
announce.desc: Display release notes when a new version is installed.

capture_notif.name: Show Capture Notifications
capture_notif.desc: Display a notification when content is captured successfully.

cancel_notif.name: Show Input Cancellation Notifications
cancel_notif.desc: Display a notification when an input prompt is cancelled.

multiline.name: Use Multi-line Input Prompt
multiline.desc: Use multi-line input prompt instead of single-line input prompt.

persist.name: Persist Input Prompt Drafts
persist.desc: Keep drafts when closing input prompts so they can be restored on reopen.

selection_capture.name: Use editor selection as default Capture value
selection_capture.desc: When enabled, Capture uses the current editor selection as {{VALUE}}.

template_folder.name: Template Folder Path
template_folder.desc: Path to the folder where templates are stored.

template_properties.name: Format template variables as proper property types (Beta)
template_properties.desc: When enabled, template variables in front matter will be formatted as proper Obsidian property types.

one_page.name: One-page input for choices (Beta)
one_page.desc: Resolve variables up front and show a single dynamic form.

date_aliases.name: Date aliases
date_aliases.desc: Shortcodes for natural language date parsing (e.g. tm = tomorrow).

disable_online.name: Disable AI & Online features
disable_online.desc: Prevents the plugin from making requests to external providers like OpenAI.

ribbon_options.name: Show icon in sidebar
ribbon_options.desc: Add QuickAdd icon to the sidebar ribbon.

one_page_override.name: One-page input override
one_page_override.desc: Override the global setting for this choice.

descriptions.view_mode: How to display the opened file
descriptions.focus: Focus the opened tab immediately after opening

template.folder_desc: Create the file in the specified folder.
template.choose_folder: Choose folder when creating a new note
template.include_subfolders_desc: Get prompted to choose from both the selected folders and their subfolders when creating the note.
template.same_folder: Create in same folder as active file
template.same_folder_desc: Creates the file in the same folder as the currently active file.
template.conflict: Set default behavior if file already exists
template.conflict_desc: Set default behavior rather then prompting user.

capture.to_desc: Target file path. Supports format syntax.
capture.file_path_desc: Choose a file or use format syntax (e.g., {{DATE}})
capture.task_desc: Formats the value as a task.
capture.format_desc: Set the format of the capture.
capture.format_required: Capture format is required when enabled
capture.create_if_missing: Create file if it doesn't exist
capture.create_if_missing_tooltip: Create file if it doesn't exist
capture.templater_after_capture: Run Templater on entire destination file after capture
capture.templater_after_capture_desc: Advanced / legacy: this executes any `<% %>` anywhere in the destination file.
capture.write_pos_desc: Where to place the capture in the file.
capture.insert_after_desc: Insert capture after specified text. Accepts format syntax.
capture.inline_desc: Insert captured content on the same line.
capture.replace_existing_desc: Replace everything after the matched text up to end-of-line.
capture.insert_end_section_desc: Place the text at the end of the matched section instead of the top.
capture.blank_lines_desc: Controls whether Insert After skips existing blank lines after the matched line.
capture.blank_lines_not_used: Not used when inserting at end of section.
capture.consider_subsections_desc: Also include the section's subsections (requires target to be a heading starting with #).
capture.consider_subsections_notice: Consider subsections requires the target to be a heading (starts with #)
capture.create_line_if_not_found_desc: Creates the 'insert after' line if it is not found.

append_link.name: Link to file
append_link.desc: Choose how QuickAdd should insert a link to the file in the current note.
append_link.placement_desc: Where to place the link when appending
append_link.type_desc: Choose whether replacing the selection should insert a link or an embed.

macro.run_on_startup_desc: Execute this macro when Obsidian starts.

errors.no_commands: No commands in the macro for choice:
errors.script_invalid: User script is invalid for choice:
errors.script_empty: User script is an empty object for choice:
errors.ai_disabled: Blocking request to OpenAI: Online features are disabled in settings.
errors.conditional_boolean: Conditional script must return a boolean result:
errors.open_file_traversal: OpenFile: Path traversal not allowed in
errors.open_file_missing: OpenFile: Does not exist or is not a file:
